abstracts.abstract: Perfluoroalkyl and Polyfluoroalkyl Substances;  Prohibits, beginning on specified dates, certain use & sale, purchase, or distribution of aqueous film forming foam; requires, beginning on specified dates, certain entities to submit aqueous film forming foam inventories & disposal plans to DEP; prohibits, beginning on specified date, possession & use of aqueous film forming foam; provides duties of department; authorizes DEP to administer certain grants or cost share programs; provides penalties & injunctive relief; requires certain public entities disposing of domestic wastewater biosolids to annually conduct specified samplings & submit results to DEP.
